Articles.Content:
Version 0.3 release!

ThrioniTech AeroSpace is known for Crazy, Hacked, and generally awesome parts that will either blow up your ship or get it to wherever you want it to be!

New parts:

1.75 m cargo shell

TTAS advanced parachute

Parts so far:

A crew module/AdvSAS part, with mechjeb and command pod versions too

A 1 m cargo shell

A 1.75 m cargo shell

an advanced parachute

a compressed fuel tank

A super-powerful nuclear engine

A sturdy Capsule

A slightly better decoupler

A stylish top for your fuel tanks that can either be used for fuel or as a missile warhead

A Very powerful decoupler with a Nuke in it to Destroy/propel your rocket

All of these parts so far are just retextures and config edits

Credits to the Squad team, NovaSilsko, and others for the models (names listed in the 'Creator' section of each part

Edited May 9, 2015 by technicalfool
Adfly links rmeoved.
Please take pictures, or else nobody is going to download.

This project is not ready for release yet. Please see your other topic to continue working. It is especially important to make sure you have permission from the authors whose models you are losing.

Locking this for now.
